p: Although the lower extremity sciatic herpes zoster is rare clinically, its symptoms and signs are very similar to those of lumbar disc herniation. Especially for the patients with a history of lumbar disc herniation and imaging of corresponding segments with nerve compression, it is easy to be confused ( 5). Here we report a case a case of suspected lumbar disc herniation with sciatic herpes zoster to reduce the rate of misdiagnosis.
